reviews.review_msg: Arrogant, demeaning, towards students. Vague and unorganized. Avoid at all costs. Should not be anywhere near teaching.

Elizabeth has a bad attitude towards her students. She was cold and curt when you talked to her. She made labs uncomfortable because she was rude and condescending when you asked for help or clarification. She was easily upset and let her temper flare in class. Her marking was unreasonably difficult, inconsistent, and slow.
